content: अतस् {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} [इदं-तसिल्] {@--1@} Than this; from this (having a comparative force); अतो देवा अवंतु नो यतो विष्णुर्विचक्रमे <ls>Rv. 1. 22. 16</ls>; किमु परमतो नर्तयसि मां <ls>Bh. 3. 6</ls>; अतोऽन्यथा <ls>Ms. 5. 31.</ls> {@--2@} From this or that cause, hence, consequently, so, therefore (corr. to यत्, यस्मात् or हि, expressed or understood); अंतर्गतं प्राणभृतां हि वेद सर्वं भवान्भावमतोभिधास्ये <ls>R. 2. 43</ls>, <ls n="R.">3. 50</ls>, <ls>Ku. 2. 5</ls>; अथातो ब्रह्मजिज्ञासा <ls>Ś. B.</ls> now therefore &c. {@--3@} Hence, from this place; henceforth (of time or place); (-परं, -ऊर्ध्वं), afterwards. {@--4@} Then (corr. of यदि-यद्).
